mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM COMMUNITY
SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, NICKNAME, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_VIEWS, COMMUNITY_GOOD FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY( COMMUNITY_NO, MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_DETAIL, COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_VIEWS, COMMUNITY_GOOD, COMMUNITY_BAD ) VALUES( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{communityCategory}, #{communityTitle}, #{communityDetail}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0 )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT_COMMUNITY( FILE_NO, REF_CNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_ACNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_CNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_NO, NICKNAME, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY, COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_DETAIL, COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_VIEWS, COMMUNITY_GOOD, COMMUNITY_BAD FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE COMMUNITY_NO = #{communityNo} ORDER BY COMMUNITY_NO DESC
